title: Software development company | Agile Development
name: Welcome to freshcode company
text: Need a superb online and mobile presence to succeed? We take on any project with infinite passion and devotion, creating efficient and elegant solutions. Consulting, engineering, UI/UX design, maintenance – there’s nothing beyond our power.
keywords: FreshCode, web development company, software development, mobile app
description: Freshcode is a software development outsourcing company with a team of web and mobile developers who provide a wide range of services following agile methods.

services.name: Development
services.text: We live and breath development, either mobile, web or desktop. We build stable architectures, create responsive interfaces and craft streamlined designs for your projects to get ahead and succeed.

services.name: Maintenance
services.text: We perform regular maintenance to prevent system's instability. Our fool-proof backup and recovery options minimize risks of unexpected failures and maximize project's uptime.

services.name: Consulting
services.text: We estimate the time and resources needed, plan the work and choose the best technologies and solutions for your needs. We provide usability analysis, architecture stability, code and UX audits.

services.name: Dedicated team
services.text: We create a dedicated team for your high priority projects. Each team member boasts specialization and skill set best fitted for your needs to ensure successful and timely development.

works.title: OUTDOOR.ROCKS
works.description: Outdoor.rocks is a young, but rapidly developing project, designed for outdoor activity lovers around the world.

works.title: GOMMEHD
works.description: GommeHD is one of the leading Minecraft Servers with more than 1 million players throughout the world. The site delivers community news and statistics, as well as the latest updates and videos.

works.title: Play Attention
works.description: Play Attention is indisputably the best cognitive training system created to improve attention, behavior and cognitive function for children and adults suffering from ADHD.

works.title: Tassta
works.description: Tassta is a hardware-software solutions platform providing more effective communication for a number of industries, including Public Transportation, Construction, Courier and Emergency Services, etc.

works.title: Data Parser
works.description: Data Parser is a cloud-based ETL application for unstructured data from any number of sources, including JSON files, with advanced search and data aggregation possibilities.

works.title: Educadio
works.description: Educadio is a Digital Learning Tool that provides a real-time synchronization for instant user collaboration and a wide variety of collaborative work means, including video and text chats.

testimonial.author: Ulrik With Andersen | Educadio
testimonial.text: We have been working with Freshcode and their programmers for almost 2 years and we highly recommend them as development partners. We highly value their abilities to deliver on time, their hard competences at writing solid, scalable code, etc., but mostly we value their ability to think up and design innovative yet solid solutions. Educadio trust them with all our software developments.

testimonial.author: Ivan Ishchenko | OutDoor
testimonial.text: While working with Freshcode I encountered transparent, accurate and well organized development process. Freshcode employes are open to feedback and flexible to incorporate new practises in their daily works. I'm pretty satisfied with the quality of delivery and will be happy to continue our fruitful cooperation.

team.title: About us
team.description: Freshcode is not just another reliable and detail-oriented team. We are a group of audacious purpose-driven individuals with unbeatable IT expertise and an open-minded attitude to provide you with truly ingenious solutions and daring products. We don’t do average, only the best!
